alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton; Pope; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:36AM CDT until June 14 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 936 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area to near Devils Knob to near Cass, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marsena... Witts Spring... Moore... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Devils Knob... Bohannon... Imo... Holman... Rosetta... Dillen... Woodland... Broomfield... Solo... Smyrna... Eula... Walnut... Bertha... Ben Hur... Bass... Fort Douglas... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
